context_bundle.summary: Unit testing patterns and frameworks for isolated component testing with minimal dependencies

onboarding.quick_start: Implement proper testing using VS Code's testing framework with TypeScript for type safety and isolated test cases
common_patterns: Use testing frameworks appropriate to language (Jest, pytest, JUnit)
Implement isolated test cases with minimal dependencies
Follow arrange-act-assert pattern for test structure
Use test doubles (mocks, stubs, fakes) for external dependencies
